data.actual_result: The bar resets. Probably just a graphical error, but sometimes images don't send if someone keep sending messages. (Has happened to me a handful of times)
data.expected_result: The bar continues to fill up like normal
data.short_description: When uploading an image, the progress bar resets when sending a message or flipping your phone
data.steps_to_repro: - upload an image to a dm or channel or choice - when the bar starts filling up, send, or make another user send a message to the same channel. Or flip your phone.
